item.title: Accelerationism
item.author: sciredomir@tutanota.com (Mahan)
item.description: At its core, accelerationism proposes that intensifying or pushing to extremes the processes inherent to modern capitalism and technology can destabilize existing social and political orders, potentially leading to the collapse or transformation of the status quo. This can create opportunities for something fundamentally new to emerge.
